pages.title: What is Jade
pages.text: Jade is a small mod that gives you helpful information about whatever you happen to be looking at in-game.$(br2)It will display a tooltip whenever you are close enough to target what you are looking at.

Jade can provide the name of what you are looking at -- as well as information to specific to the type of thing.$(br2)For creatures it can show you their health; for chests and such it can show you what is inside...and much more
